summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2010 TOYOTA  4RUNNER. THE CONTACT RECEIVED NOTIFICATION OF NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 16V340000 (AIR BAGS) HOWEVER, THE PARTS TO DO THE REPAIR WERE UNAVAILABLE. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE MANUFACTURER EXCEEDED A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME FOR THE RECALL REPAIR.  THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO A LOCAL DEALER TOYOTA OF MIDLAND  LOCATED AT 800 N LOOP 250 W MIDLAND, TX 79703 WHERE  IT WAS INFORMED THAT THE RECALL REMEDY PARTS WERE ON BACK ORDER AND SHOULD ARRIVE IN TWO WEEKS. THE CONTACT LEFT A VOICE MAIL MESSAGE FOR THE SERVICE MANAGER BUT RECEIVED NO RESPONSE.  THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT NOTIFIED OF THE ISSUE. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE. PARTS DISTRIBUTION DISCONNECT.
